usage_tips: Use 'tumu' for search_field to search across all fields
Wildcard '*' can be used as query for broad searches with filters
Turkish characters (ğ, ü, ş, ı, ö, ç) are fully supported
Results are cached for 1 hour - subsequent identical queries will be faster
Rate limiting ensures 1.5 seconds between requests to YÖK servers
For best results, combine multiple filters (university + year + type)
Use get_thesis_details after search to get full information about specific theses
